mapper.insert: insert into bucket values ( seq_buc_idx.nextval, #{bucCusoIdx}, #{bucBread}, #{bucMain}, #{bucVegi}, #{bucCheese}, #{bucSource}, #{bucTopping}, #{bucSide}, #{bucIsSalad}, #{bucIsOvened}, #{bucSet}, #{bucCost}, #{bucDiscntRate}, #{bucKcal}, #{bucQuantity}, default )
mapper.select: select buc_bread as bucBread, buc_main as bucMain, buc_vegi as bucVegi, buc_cheese as bucCheese, buc_source as bucSource, buc_topping as bucTopping, buc_side as bucSide, buc_is_salad as bucIsSalad, buc_is_ovened as bucIsOvened, buc_set as bucSet, buc_cost as bucCost, buc_discnt_rate as bucDiscntRate, buc_kcal as bucKcal, buc_quantity as bucQuantity, buc_reg_date as bucRegDate from bucket where buc_cuso_idx = #{cusoIdx}
